item.title: Hello, World!
item.author: mjs2600@gmail.com (Michael Simpson)
item.description: In this blog I plan to share interesting things that I find. I’m also hoping to post some of my half finished ideas and experiements. I think more clearly when I write and I’d like to take advantage of that to work through the things bouncing around in my head.

item.title: About Me
item.author: mjs2600@gmail.com (Michael Simpson)
item.description: I live in Middlebury, Vermont with my wife, Mary Jane, and two small children. I am a data scientist at Very and a graduate student in Georgia Tech’s OMSCS program.
